overview.en: Based on the characteristics and advantages of the blockchain, the energy chain created a Token-based ecosystem and a value trading platform that serves the energy ecology, transforming energy big data into token-holder digital assets.
overview.zh: 能源链基于区块链的特性和优势，创建了一个基于 Token 的生态系统，以及服务于能源生态的价值交易平台，将能源大数据转化为代币持有者的数字资产。
